headline: Hershey (HSY) Registers a Bigger Fall Than the Market: Important Facts to Note
summary: The latest trading day saw Hershey (HSY) settling at $191.09, representing a -1.22% change from its previous close.

headline: Goldman Sachs upgrades Hershey Co. to "buy" amid improved market share trends
summary: Investing.com - The risk-to-reward profile around Hershey Co . (NYSE:HSY) has become more "compelling" following a series of guidance cuts by the chocolate maker over the past year, analysts at Goldman Sachs said in a note raising their rating of the firm to "buy" from "sell."

headline: Apple initiated, Hershey upgraded: Wall Street’s top analyst calls
summary: The most talked about and market moving research calls around Wall Street are now in one place. Here are today’s research calls that investors need to know, as compiled by The Fly. Top 5 Upgrades: Arete upgraded Baidu (BIDU) to Buy from Sell with a $143 price target. AI chips remain under-supplied within China and Baidu’s Kunlun chip venture has the potential to more than offset the struggling online advertising business, the firm tells investors. Citizens JMP upgraded CoreWeave (CRWV) to Outper

headline: Hershey (HSY): A Fresh Look at Valuation After Sneaker-Shaped Shaq-A-Licious Gummies Launch
summary: Hershey (HSY) just dropped a new twist in its collaboration with Shaquille O’Neal, unveiling sneaker-shaped Shaq-A-Licious XL Gummies. The launch builds off last year’s hit release, which quickly became Hershey’s top-selling sweet for 2024. By merging Shaq’s larger-than-life personality with playful product innovation, Hershey is doubling down on the winning formula of celebrity branding, something that always gets Wall Street and sweet-toothed shoppers buzzing. Looking at the bigger...

headline: 2 High-Flying Stocks to Keep an Eye On and 1 We Avoid
summary: Expensive stocks often command premium valuations because the market thinks their business models are exceptional. However, the downside is that high expectations are already baked into their prices, leaving little room for error if they stumble even slightly.
